long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTLDW saves you time by extracting YouTube video transcripts and sending them to ChatGPT with instructions in a new tab—all in one click. 

With YouTLDW, you can quickly get the key points from lengthy videos without watching them in full.

By Clicking the YouTLDW button you can get a summary of the video in bullet-point format, or by clicking the Pencil button you can enter a custom set of instructions for ChatGPT to perform on the transcript.

Note: You must be logged into ChatGPT and there must not be any captcha prompts present. If this occurs you'll need to return to YouTube and click the YouTLDW button again.
